parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: ID of the content to be updated.

parameter.name: versionNumber
parameter.description: Integer number of the version to be updated.

parameter.name: newStatus
parameter.description: New status value to be change content status. Posible values are 'current' and 'trashed'.

parameter.name: ancestors
parameter.description: To update a page and change its parent page, supply the ancestors property.

parameter.name: existingStatus
parameter.description: The existing status of the content to be updated.

parameter.name: conflictPolicy
parameter.description: The conflict policy of the content to be updated. Default value is 'abort'.
